fields.content: Two players A and B take turns placing bishops on the squares of a chessboard. At each turn, the bishop must threaten atleast one square not threatened by the other bishop. The player who cannot move is the loser. ( A bishop “threatens” the square it is placed on). Which player wins ?

Two of Ash,Brock and Misty are playing a pokemon match against each other.
1)The shorter of Ash and Brock is the older of the two players.
2)The younger of Brock and Misty is the shorter of the two players.
3)The taller of Brock and Misty is the younger of the two players.
Who is not playing?
(NOTE: Don't relate to the characters of the show)

Ash is a Pokémon trainer. Once walking in Viridian forest he caught hold of a new large Pokémon - 'Cookieoto' by a tough fight. But unfortunately Cookieoto got fainted during the fight. So he was rushed to a Pokémon centre.Now, Nurse Joy advised a set of 18 vitamins to Cookieoto to get well. Each vitamin comes in form of a circular cookie of varying diameter. The cookies are arranged in form of a stack. Nurse Joy also told an order of serving cookies to our Pokémon that is the cookie with smaller diameter is to be served first. Now Ash is left to the task of sorting the cookies; as the cookies are very large so for this he is given a machine. The machine can take only one input that is 'x' and flip first 'x' cookies from the top of the stack. What is the minimum number of operations that Ash needs to perform to get the cookies in right order.
You are also told that team Rocket has already secretly visited the centre and
arranged the cookies so as to make Ash's job as difficult as possible(worst case).

There are 16 Pokémon's which fight for a knockout championship league. Which goes as usual that is the matches are conducted b/w two players(Pokémons) and the one who wins advances to the next Level. The overall winner gets a price of $5000. You are given the ranks (Ri) of the Pokémons and that the Pokémon with a better rank defeats the other. In mathematical terms player i beats player j if i<j. You have interest in your Pokémon--'Diwizard' which is ranked 2nd amongst all. So unfortunately you will not be getting those $5000. But fortunately there is a consolation prize of INR 100000. So you are interested in knowing the probability of you getting the prize
On 12th September 2000 Charlizad is exactly 10 years in age. 4 years from now he will be exactly 2 years more than twice of Pikachu's age. What's Pikachu's birthdate.(DD/MM/YYYY)

What does this message say?
G T Y O R J O T E O U I A B G T

Five pirates have obtained 100 gold coins and have to divide up the loot. The pirates are all extremely intelligent, treacherous and selfish (especially the captain).
The captain always proposes a distribution of the loot. All pirates vote on the proposal, and if half the crew or more go "Aye", the loot is divided as proposed, as no pirate would be willing to take on the captain without superior force on their side.
If the captain fails to obtain support of at least half his crew (which includes himself), he faces a mutiny, and all pirates will turn against him and make him walk the plank. The pirates start over again with the next senior pirate as captain.
What is the maximum number of coins the captain can keep without risking his life?

Ash and Brock just became friends with Misty, and they want to know when her birthday is. Misty gives them a list of 10 possible dates. May 15, May 16, May 19 June 17, June 18 July 14, July 16 August 14, August 15, August 17 Misty then tells Ash and Brock separately the month and the day of her birthday respectively. Ash: I don’t know when Misty birthday is, but I know that Brock does not know too. Brock: At first I don’t know when Misty birthday is, but I know now. Ash: Then I also know when Misty birthday is. So when is Misty’s birthday?(Format: Month XX)

In the world of Pokemon, If a female pokemon eats a special berry, she hatches an egg that gives life to a new young pokemon. I always ask poke-mom at random if she has hatched two poke-eggs and also if one is a male born on a tuesday. After a long search I finally find someone who answers yes. What is the probability that this poke-mom has hatched two males? Assume an equal chance of giving birth to either sex and an equal chance to giving birth on any day.

There is a safe with a 5 digit number as the key. The 4th digit is 4 greater than
the second digit, while the 3rd digit is 3 less than the 2nd digit. The 1st digit is
thrice the last digit. There are 3 pairs whose sum is 11.
Find the number.

You have to cross a large desert that is 1000 Km. You have a ponyta and 3000
apples. The ponyta can carry a maximum of 1000 apples at any time. For every
Kilometre that the ponyta needs to travel, it eats one apple before it can start
moving. What is the maximum number of uneaten apples that the ponyta can
transport to the other end of the desert?

A wealthy man needed to pay the mason building his house. He was running
low on cash, so he decided to pay the mason with a gold chain with 7 links. The
mason’s fee was equivalent to one gold link a day. The wealthy man needed to pay
the mason every day, as otherwise he would stop working. If he overpaid, the
mason might run away with the extra payment.
The wealthy man did not want to make too many cuts in the chains as he wanted it
back once he had the cash to pay the mason in cash. What is the minimum number
of cuts that the wealthy man needs to make in the chain?

Someone has stolen Mr.Mime's Wig and has put it in one of four locked boxes. The boxes are numbered from 1,2,3,4 in that order. There are four different keys that each has their own color. Use the clues to find the box where Mr.Mime's wig is being kept. 
1. The green key goes to the third or fourth box
2. The wig is to the left of the fourth box
3. The wig is to the right of the first box
4. The yellow key is to the left of the wig
5. The blue key is to the right of the yellow key and to the left of the green key
6. The red key goes to the first box

(ANS FORMAT: first/second/third/fourth)

Recently Mr And Mrs Crazy have heard the news about the petrol shortage. The
king has introduced to the villagers petrol rationing according to the following
system, based on the 3-digit number of each number-plate (000 to 999) of the cars
in the village.
People could only buy petrol on certain days as follows:
Sunday: if each of the three digits was less than 6
Monday: if the 3-digit number was odd
Tuesday: if the sum of the three digits was greater than 10
Wednesday: if the 3-digit number was a multiple of 3
Thursday: if the sum of the three digits was less than 15 
Friday: if at least two of the three digits were the same Saturday: if the 3-digit number was less than 500 If Mr. and Mrs. Crazy could refuel their car on any day of the week, what is the number on their car's number-plate?
The year 1978 has an unusual property. When you add the 19 to the 78, the total is the same as the middle two digits (97). What will be the next year to have this same property?

There was a death on Treebark Ln. The victim was identified as Mark Oswalt, who recently was married. The police went to the crime scene and they reported the death as a suicide. Later that day, after the police left, a private detective, hired by the victim's friend who thought it was a murder, searched the crime scene and found a note the police missed. It read, "4,3: 8,1:_: 9,1: 2,1: 7,4:_: 6,1:9,3:_: 9,1: 4,3: 3,3: 3,2: !". The detective took out his cell phone and started dialing the police to tell them about his findings. Once the detective opened the phone to dial, he immediately screamed out, "I SOLVED IT!" Who was the murderer?

Daniel marked a point on a plane with sympathetic ink and he has also drawn a regular Hendecagon with normal ink. Max can see the polygon , but can't see the point. Max can draw a line and ask Daniel which side of the line the point is. What is the minimum number of questions Max have to ask to define if the point is inside the polygon in the worstcase?

Four people need to cross a rickety bridge at night. Unfortunately, they have only one torch and the bridge is too dangerous to cross without one. The bridge is only strong enough to support two people at a time. Not all people take the same time to cross the bridge. Times for each person: 1 min, 2 mins, 7 mins and 10 mins. What is the shortest time in min needed for all four of them to cross the bridge?

1
11
21
1211
111221
312211
M
N
O
Find n(M) + n(N) – n(O) + O            
[where n(X) represents no. of digits in X]

In the Pokemon gym battle for glory, Ash Ketchum, the challenger is up against Roberto Coloraso,the defender, also known as the best gym leader in the history of Pokemon. Ash has been preparing for this his whole life. The way in which the battle works is this:
There are 6 rounds in the battle. In the first round, the defender chooses any one Pokemon for battle. In the second round, he chooses any two for battle and so on. For every round, the challenger can choose
as many Pokemon as he wants for battle. For example, he could select 5 Pokemon to fight against the 1
of the defender in round one. But, he cannot use 5 extra powerful Pokemon to fight against a small
Pokemon of the defender! The battle must be a fair battle at all times. The battle judge decides if the
Pokemon selected by the challenger are a fair match for the defender. Thus, choosing the correct
number of appropriately powerful Pokemon is the most difficult task of the challenger.
Ash has been preparing for this battle for his whole life and has concocted the perfect function which
solves this peculiar problem, while making sure that a weak team is not selected. The function tells Ash
the number of Pokemon needed in each round. This function makes sure that the perfect team is
selected for each round. This function is so flawless that it makes sure that Ash wins. The function also
makes sure that the battle is interesting. It doesn’t always choose the same number of Pokemon that
the defender chooses. The number will differ atleast once in battle.
The function is a monic polynomial of least degree that gives out the number of Pokemon needed to
fight in each round.
The battle starts.
Round 1: The defender selects a Pokemon. Ash selects a Pokemon. Ash wins, obviously ;).
Round 2: The defender selects 2 Pokemon. Ash selects 2 Pokemon. Ash wins.
Round 3: The defender selects 3 Pokemon. Ash selects 3 Pokemon. Ash wins.
Round 4: The defender selects 4 Pokemon. Ash selects 4 Pokemon. Ash wins.
Round 5: The defender selects 5 Pokemon. Ash selects 5 Pokemon. Ash wins.
Round 6: The defender selects 6 Pokemon.
How many Pokemon does Ash select?

Ash Ketchum is on a quest to catch Pokemon in a forest. There are three different types of Pokemon
in the forest: Fire, Water and Grass. The forest is in the form of a rectangular grid with 7 columns and 3
rows. Every element of the forest grid has 1 Pokemon, which could be of any of the three types. Ash is
travelling along the length of the forest. He is in a hurry and so can only catch 1 Pokemon in every row.
Also, he is constrained to not move in the same row for 2 consecutive columns. Ash wants to have some
more fun and decides to catch an even number of fire type Pokemon (i.e. 0 or 2 or 4 or …).
As an example, suppose we have a 3x3 grid as shown.
Column 1 Column 2 Column 3
Row 1 F W W
Row 2 G G G
Row 3 F F W
F – Fire G – Grass W – Water
One way for Ash to go through this quest is to catch the fire type Pokemon in column 1 row 1, then the
fire type in column 2 row 3 and then the water type in column 3 row 1.
Therefore, one of the solution is 1-3- 1. This is the row number in the corresponding columns starting
from column 1 through 3.
Similarly, the other solutions for this problem are:
 1-3- 2
 2-1- 2
 2-1- 3
In how many ways can Ash journey through the following forest?
Column 1 Column 2 Column 3 Column 4 Column 5 Column 6 Column 7
Row 1 F G F W W F W
Row 2 G F F G F G F
Row 3 G G G F G F F

Misty has some things which belong to Serena in her bag and it has been locked using a 5-digit
password combination. As Misty is busy with her work she gives some clues to Serena to help her
out find the password.
Hints:
1. The fourth digit of the password is four more than the second one.
2. The third digit of the password is three less than the second one.
3. The first digit is three times the last one.
4. Three pairs of digits sum up to be eleven.
What is the Password??

You are a Pokémon trainer. You are standing at the door of a temple. The temple is the home for the
rarest Pokémon. But to enter the temple you have to enter the password. The guard of the temple gives
you some hints:
It is an eight digit password.
It consist of 8,8,7,7,4,4,0,0.
0’s are separated by one digit, 4’s are separated by two digt,8’s are separated by 3 digit and 7’s
are separated by four digits.
What is the password?

Assume you're playing PoGo and the tracking device is working!!!
3 steps - 100m +
2 steps - 60m +
1 step - 25m+
You are standing exactly on the 60 m radius circle, tracking a Mew. What is the maximum distance you might have to cover to reach the centre?

Cryptography or cryptology is the practice and study of techniques for secure 
communication in the presence of third parties called adversaries. 
In a given crypt, each alphabet stands for a particular number according to a relation. Your
job is to decipher and arrange your “code” to generate the name of a Pokémon. Here are a few
hints to help you:
B corresponds to 3
H corresponds to 28657
Characteristics: This Pokémon is extremely fast, able to circle around the globe in sixteen
hours. It has a small horn on the top of its head, along with slightly "S" shaped antennae. Much
like its previous forms, it still has a gentle and somewhat innocent appearance and a kind-
hearted disposition. They have been said to save people from drowning and lead ships that have
been trapped in storms to safety.
Its name is:
13 R 2 1597 O N 514229 T 89 (9 Letters)

You are lost in a dense rain-forest. To satisfy your hunger you eat a wild mushroom. But you
later realize that it is a poisonous one. As an anecdote you have to lick a special kind of frog available
in the forest. But you must lick a female frog of that kind, as the male ones don’t produce any
anecdote. To make it worse both male and female frogs look the same, only distinguishable by a
distinctive croak of the male frogs. Now suddenly you see a frog on your left, and at the same time
you hear the croak of a frog at your right, but when you turn you see two frogs, and you don’t know
who croaked. Now you have only enough time to go one way. Which way should you go so that it
increases your chances of survival? Let 1/n be the probability that you survive when you go left and
1/m be probability that you survive when you go right. Then m*n = ?

How many steps are required to break an 25 x 20 bar of chocolate into 1 x 1 pieces? 
You can break an existing piece of chocolate horizontally or vertically. 
You cannot break two or more pieces at once (so no cutting through stacks).

You are Ash and have to infiltrate the control room of Team Rocket Association and delete all
their evil data. Now the building of the asoc is 10 floor building(including ground) , of the form of a
pyramid. The only info u have is that each floor N , has that 10-N number of rooms( i.e, Ground floor
has 10 rooms as N=0 for ground floor). Now you can fly into any floor, but you have only enough
time to inspect 1 floor before the backup arrives. Now in the flor where control room is , all rooms
must have 3 doors leading to 3 different rooms, and only one of the rooms have a door (out of the
three doors in that room) leading to the Control Room. On which floor is the control?( The control
room has to be considered as one of the rooms on that floor)

On a barnyard, there was a psyduck, a doduo and a pegie.
The psyduck could fly at 5 mph but, as psyduck are poor flyers, he gets tired very
soon. After only 2 minutes of flying, he had to walk at 1 mph for next three
minutes before he could fly again. The doduo could fly continuously at 4 mph, but
he had a habit of swerving back and forth. So for every 3 feet he flies, he actually
only travels 2 feet. The pegie could fly straight, at 2 mph.
Which animal would win a one mile race?
1 mile = 5280
